definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: domineer, be master of (late) (NH id.; As. šalâṭu, have power; Ar. 4alh.o0 overcome, prevail; salut.a strong, hard, saliyt.un dominion, also ruler, sultan; Eth. sult.a0nun Aram. [[שְׁלַט]], 3alat’a: (esp. der. spec.), Nab. [[שלט]], [[שלטן]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[שׁ]]: Ec 8:9, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇשְׁלַט]] Ec 2:19, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[שְׁלוֹט]] Es 9:1;—domineer, lord it over, [[עַל]] pers., Ne 5:15; [[ב]] pers. Ec 8:9 ([[לְרַע לוֹ]]); [[ב]] rei Ec 2:19; become master of, [[ב]] pers. Es 9:1, Es 9:1.

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: give power of: Pf. 3 ms. sf. pers. [[וְהִשְׁלִימוֹ לֶאֱכׂל]] Ec 5:18, so Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יַשְׁליטֶנּוּ]] Ec 6:2 (both subj. God).

definitions.title: 2. = Qal,
definitions.body: get mastery of: juss. 3 fs. [[אַל־תַּשְׁלֶט־בִּי]] [[כָּל־אָָוֶן]] Ps 119:133.
